name: Magic Cross Stitch: Pixel Art
description:
Brighten up your weekdays and enjoy a wide collection of colorful pixel pictures! Start painting right now without paper and pencils! There’s no need to bother choosing colors - just paint by numbers and create your own masterpiece!

In Magic Cross Stitch you can:

- Choose among an extensive variety of pictures for both adults and kids!
- Enjoy easy gameplay - just color by numbers!
- Use Augmented Reality Sharing to place your paintings on the walls around you!
- Experiment with the color palette and improve your skills!
- Share finished pictures with friends on social media or save them to your phone!
- Get daily bonuses and gifts!

Magic Cross Stitch is great way to relax and get rid of everyday stress! Unveil your inner artist and paint effortlessly! Color by numbers and turn a plain sketch into a bright art piece! Paint everywhere just by using your phone or tablet!

Contact us at support_games@zimad.com with any issues, questions or comments. We would love to hear from you!

- Subscription:
Upon subscribing, you will immediately receive free access to the full collection of pixel art images! A subscription also allows you to create unlimited amount of your own user-created pixel art images and turns off ads in the game.
The price is $7.99 per week or equal to the same price tier that "Apple's App Store Price Matrix" determines in other currencies.
In case of cancelling a subscription you lose all the benefits described above.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
Payment is charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original package, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
